title: Bug 120922 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be accessed until the changes are saved. The user is prompted with the following options: 'Yes' - to save the changes, 'No' - to discard the changes, and 'Cancel' - to remain on the Source page without taking any action. The dialog is currently titled 'Error' (including the quotes).
OB: The 'Dirty Page' behavior is not user-friendly. The dialog title is misleading.
EB: The 'Dirty Page' behavior should be improved to provide a more typical approach. The dialog title should be more accurate and should not include quotes.
